title.narrative: Nature and biodiversity in Development assistance – an option paper

description.narrative:
To identify opportunities to strengthen considerations for nature based solutions and biodiversity within engagements of Danish development assistance, especially with focus on the people/nature relations.
The study will consolidate key lessons learned within Danish support for nature and biodiversity (“green environment”) to developing countries. The findings will feed into discussions and guidance for how to improve focus on green environment within future Danish development assistance, with respect to focus, modalities and partners. The study will also guide considerations on further evaluation work on the issue.
